article.title: DRC Awarded U.S. Coast Guard Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Dynamics Research Corporation (DRC) has been awarded a $5 million contract with the U.S. Coast Guard's Office of Policy Integration to provide project management, analysis, and technical and documentation services. Under the agreement, DRC will provide mission and capabilities analysis and mission essential task list development to support the Coast Guard's Readiness, Requirement and Resource programs.
